ygData.subject: The Hunt for the Wolf Khan
ygData.msgSnippet: Katya was walking fast, almost running in the corridors. Blackfang was hot in her trail, trying to convince her. Blackfang: Hey! You just can t do that!

Katya was walking fast, almost running in the corridors. Blackfang was
hot in her trail, trying to convince her.

Blackfang: Hey! You just can't do that! There's no way it's going to
work. And even if it does, there's going to be lots of scrap to pick
up after. Are you even listening?

She wasn't. She didn't want to. Somewhere deep inside, she knew he was
right, but it didn't matter. She just had to do that.

She arrived at the place she sought. Razael's quarters.
She banged on the door a few times.

Katya: Razael! Are you there, quiaff? Open up, it's Katya!
